name: Magnet Mania 3D
description:
Magnet Mania 3D is a fun and educational simulation game for small and big engineers to learn about the fascinating world of magnetism and physics.



Players will take on the role of a scientist, experimenting with different magnets and objects to explore the properties of magnetic force. They will learn about the north and south poles, magnetic fields, and how magnets interact with different materials. The game features colorful graphics, engaging gameplay, and interactive tutorials that make learning about science fun and easy. With Magnet Physics, children will be able to develop a deeper understanding of the laws of physics and be better prepared for their science classes.
